extendedInfo.description: AnTuTu Battery Saver is a power saving for Android phone/pad. (need root)To maintain normal for 2 days in order to know is truly your saving power of the software, you can set your sleep time, in order to better saving electricity.

reviews.title: Effective!
reviews.comment: Effective in the sense of using another power saver which is juicedefender. I\'m using both at the same time, and it\'s really effective. 12hours batt life of average usage w/o using any powersaver but almost 48hrs using both.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix!!!
reviews.comment: This app needs to be very much updated!!! Because It keeps drowning my battery down, I had to buy a car charger in order to keep it on... At first, I was taking my home charger with me everywhere i went. Please fix this problem please! :( :( :( :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Evey couple of minutes a pop up pop\'s up that says battery saver granted permission by super user and its annoying it stops the video I\'m watching and make my apps lag and sometimes freeze
reviews.author: Guillermo Lara

reviews.title: Fc after update
reviews.comment: After latest update fc every 5sec. Pls fix  this problem.  Notification shows wrong battery stats.  It remains static
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Man, does thing draw out my battery life majorly!
reviews.author: Michael L. Bowie

reviews.title: The Best App.
reviews.comment: I\'ve used it before & installing it now in my S 3.It\'s great.
reviews.author: Balayat Hossain

reviews.title: EPIC Battery Saver
reviews.comment: The first hour or two after I downloaded this, it would randomly open by itself, and close out whatever app I was in. It was verrrrry iritating, and I almost uninstalled it.   BUT...  I rebooted, and it has worked like a charm ever since. Not just a charm, either. I\'ve tried 4 or 5 diff bat savers, and ANTUTU Battery Saver is HANDS DOWN the best saver out there.   I woke up with 50percent battery, was late for work and had no time to charge, so I tured on antutu, worked, came home, still 30 percent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Only one app really help to extend my battery life, I\'ve try to use other but no any app can replace. 4 stars coz the battery level does not update when my battery level changed.
reviews.author: Benyapa Saekao

reviews.title: Bad Battery Management
reviews.comment: CPU frequency and Screen dimming does Not Reset to Default when the phone is charging. Battery saving should be active ONLY when the phone is running on battery. Rooted GS2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but big price tag!
reviews.comment: It works, and even better together with Deep Sleep Battery Saver. I had to disable the pop-up on SU\'s settings. Paid version isn\'t exactly cheap.
reviews.author: Daniel Camargo

reviews.title: Unnecessary pop-up
reviews.comment: My android phone is rooted and i frequently experience this pop-up msg. It makes my phone lag-ish. Hope you can find a workaround with this. Thanks!
reviews.author: jillix p

reviews.title: AMAZING!
reviews.comment: I tried 4 other programs that didn\'t work (I was loosing 10% battery ever hour without using my phone and with GPS and WIFI off. I started this program and now my battery is only loosing 2 or 3% per hour with WIFI and GPS on!
reviews.author: Josh Wallie

reviews.title: Problem !
reviews.comment: This apps runing at my samsung tab 2, but sometime screen freezing!
reviews.author: szechiu ng

reviews.title: Bullshit
reviews.comment: Have been using it for a while now,  but it suddenly started opening Google Play to one of their other apps. Assholes. Uninstalling
reviews.author: Michael Adkisson

reviews.title: Bad at first but after a week works like a dream
reviews.comment: I got this app because my old battery was having trouble holding charge through the day with moderate usage. The first week I was disappointed. My phone was lagging whenever it was on level 2 or 3, but then it learned and now gets me to school with 90% or more before it was 80 or lower and lunch with 60% as opposed to 35-40% without and the first week. No lag though. mind you this is with constant 7 hr Pandora stream from 7am  to 2pm. And Atuntu on at level 3
reviews.author: Sneh Patel

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Went to bed with 60% bat then woke up 6 hours later at same..great combination with overclock master pro running cpu at minimal when locked..awesome battery save
reviews.author: James Kirkpatrick

reviews.title: It really works
reviews.comment: My Xperia Ion has terrible battery life without any battery saving apps installed and I tried most of the ones out there and they had minimal effect. This is the only one that has been working so far. I think I get almost 1.5x the normal battery life.
reviews.author: John Kim

reviews.title: No issues!
reviews.comment: The popups mentioned in previous reviews is a necessity for this app to be as adaptive as it is.  I don\'t mind the popup because of how awesome this app is at saving my battery!  The popup is from your SuperUser app...not this one.
reviews.author: Derek Traywick

reviews.title: Guri
reviews.comment: A good app it fastest battrey saver
reviews.author: pritpal singh

reviews.title: GREAT BATTERY SAVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Cool helps. And much much better with juice defender  @Guiller Laro  When it pops up press the remember button. That\'ll fix your Problem
reviews.author: Jozhua Martin E. Simeon
